isis.stitle: DT/DTA-466 Diesel Engine Service (1990) - TIMING GEAR TRAIN AND FRONT COVER - INJECTION PUMP DRIVE GEAR

step1.para: Install the injection pump and gasket to the front cover. Refer to FUEL INJECTION PUMP.
If removed, install the mechanical tachometer drive adapter with new seal ring onto injection pump access cover. This applies to only those engines equipped with a mechanical tachometer.

note.para: Prior to access cover installation, be sure to tighten the two engine front cover mounting bolts which will be covered by the access cover. Refer to Figure 8.20.
For engines equipped with a mechanical tachometer, be sure that the tang of the drive adapter engages the slot in the end of the injection pump camshaft.

figure.caption: Figure 8.20. Tighten Front Cover Bolts Prior to Installing Access Cover.

step1.para: Install the injection pump drive gear access cover using a new gasket as follows:

step2.para:
Secure the three bolts and washers which fasten into the front cover casting. Refer to Figure 8.21
.
Secure the bolts, washers and nuts which mount through the access cover, front cover and adapter housing.
Tighten the fasteners to the standard torque. See Appendix.

step1.para: Refer to FUEL INJECTION PUMP for installation procedures of the fuel injector and related components.
Prime the lubricating system as specified in CONNECTING RODS, PISTONS, RINGS AND SLEEVES.

figure.caption: Figure 8.21. Install Injection Pump Drive Gear Access Cover.
